endpoint.uri: dynamically updated by the AlexaSkill CDK Construct

en-US.description: Keep up to date with what's going on with mortgage rates and other important financial rates like the ten year treasury. Information is aggregated from Mortgage News Daily and CNBC
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask rate talker about rates
Alexa, read me the latest mortgage news daily article
keywords: mortgage rates, interest rates, treasury rates
en-US.name: Rate Talker (Dev)
en-US.summary: Useful for gathering information on mortgage rates and other key financial metrics.
